start.instructions:

*Username with '@' symbol:*

*Phone number with '+' symbol:*

*Direct link to a story:*

ğŸŒŸ *Premium Access*

Premium users get:
âœ… Unlimited story downloads
âœ… Monitor up to {{limit}} users' active stories
